price: 27. Sida Rabbigay iigu denbi dhaafay, oo uu iiga mid yeelay kuwa la sharfay!
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
